subject: Re: Medium---well!
author: Jill
full_text:
That doesn't surprise me at all.  I wish someone could figure out why using the box enhances one's abilities as a medium, but apparently this is so -- I know it was true for me.  As much experience as you have, Frank, it would seem to follow you'd have built up some considerable ability.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Went to the medium development class last night and OMG! Suprised myselff,
> had no idea I could get visions on demand like that. I am uncertain if it
> was due to being in a group with those expectations though. I've never
> attempted to read for anyone before, always seems kinda presumptuous to me.
> They do a circle for exchanging messages the third Friday of the month.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
